member.name: T:System.Web.Optimization.Builds
member.summary: Represents a helper class for rendering link elements. Represents a type that allows queuing and rendering script elements.

member.name: M:System.Web.Optimization.Builds.Styles(System.String[])
member.summary: Renders link tags for a set of paths.
member.param: Set of css paths for which to generate link tags.
member.returns: A HTML string containing the link tag or tags for the bundle.

member.name: M:System.Web.Optimization.Builds.Scripts(System.String[])
member.summary: Renders script tags for the following paths.
member.param: Set of js paths for which to generate script tags.
member.returns: The HTML string containing the script tag or tags for the bundle.
